DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at the function of infant formula components to optimize the nutritional content and functionality of a marketed routine infant formula.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Cow Milk-Based Formulas - Functional Proteins
DOC.criteria: 1018 days of age 3742 weeks gestation birth weight 2500 g or more consuming one source of nutrition metabolic or chronic disease acute infection feeding difficulties consumed complementary foods or donor milk steroid use
DOC.keyword: optimize nutritional content of infant formula
